definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in

sentences.english: I have get a paper-clip. Will that do?
sentences.chinese: 我有一個曲別針。能行嗎？

sentences.english: Or try sliding the pencil close to the heavier clip.
sentences.chinese: 或許可以試着將鉛筆向重的曲別針一邊滑動。

sentences.english: The letters were held together with a paper clip.
sentences.chinese: 這些信是用一枚曲別針夾在一齊的。

sentences.english: I have got a paper - clip .
Other important things without which our office stationary cannot be completed are paper clips.
sentences.chinese: 另一個缺一不可的辦公用品就是曲別針。

sentences.english: Below the message list at the far right, you should see a paperclip icon.
sentences.chinese: 在郵件列表下面的最右邊，您應看到一個曲別針圖標。

sentences.english: Fasten a paper clip to the aeroplane's nose.
sentences.chinese: 用一個曲別針固定在飛機前端。

sentences.english: Long ago, each pin had to be made by hand.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，每個曲別針都是手工做成的。

sentences.english: She had curling pins in her hair.
sentences.chinese: 她頭髮上插着些曲別針。
